Question:: Can I customize the reports (both on-screen and printable) myself?
Revised question: Can the client easily customize reports as either on-screen or printable?
Comments: This is tied to the create reports question. While we are capable of answering this question, we don't seem to have this indicated anywhere in our matrix. Add a new end user requirement?

Question:: Can users save their work?
Revised question: Can I save work and return to it during another session?
build/end user Requirements: Save work and return to it at a later date

Question:: Can I share my maps with my coworkers, clients, contractors?
Revised question: Can I save my work on the map and share it with another person (Save session inside and outside government)?
build/end user Requirements: SHARE the mapping application session and its data internally within government; SHARE the mapping application session and its data externally with non-government

Question:: Can I import/export data, what formats?
Revised question: What type of data format can you import or export?  Plus can I bring in a GIS file that may or may not be officially published
build/end user Requirements: Consume and integrate local data into the web mapping application; Transfer data collected within the web mapping application to operational systems
Comments: Published equals approved format and not just a random AOI using heads up digitizing.  Is integrating local data the same as export/import? What about "consume and integrate provincial data"? Does "transfer data to operational systems also relate to this question?

Question:: Can I export an AOI to use in my GIS for advanced analysis
Revised question: Can I export an AOI to use in my GIS for advanced analysis
build/end user Requirements: Download the data being viewed
Comments: does "download data being viewed" equal "export AOI"? Or are we talking about something different here?

Question:: Can I import a variety of geographic file types (shp, KML etc)
Revised question: Can I import a variety of geographic file types (shp, KML etc)
build/end user Requirements: Consume and integrate local data into the web mapping application

Question:: What projections/datums are possible?
Revised question: Which geographic projection and datums are available for use with this application?
Comments: No answer to this question

Question:: Can it use our data sources?
Revised question: Can it use the internal data that may be Regional or internal to a Branch that is not published in the BCGW?
build/end user Requirements: Consume and integrate Provincial data into the web mapping application; Consume and integrate External data into the web mapping application (WMS, REST)
Comments: Wouldn't hurt to have more information on specific data sources (i.e. CWM has trouble getting data from BCGW currently)

Question:: Can I save my queries to easily return to them later?
Revised question: Can I create and save data queries to return to them during another session.
build/end user Requirements: Save work and return to it at a later date
Comments: save work and return to it might not necessarily mean "save a query". I wonder if we can be more specific

Question:: Can I bookmark my place on the map with the correct layers showing
Revised question: Can I save the layout settings and geographic location so I can return to a place on the map with
Comments: No answer to this question

Question:: Can I use the solution offline?
Revised question: Can the application be used when it  isn't connected to the internet?

Comments: Duplicated question. Also, having data available offline and the whole solution available offline might be two different things. Is that so?

Question:: What can I do on the map? (i.e. draw shape, measure distance, plan route, etc.)
Revised question: Can I draw and edit an Area of Interest to use to query the spatial layers?
build/end user Requirements: Identify & discover relationships among features (e.g. proximity, intersection)
Comments: I don't quite agree with the revised question here. The original question was more about the on-map tools available for ease of use (i.e. measure distance, area, draw polygons, compare them, etc). I think that the requirement answers this, just not in detail?

Question:: Is map easy to navigate? (controls, search)
Revised question: Can you search for geographic locations or a specific feature on the map?
build/end user Requirements: Easily FIND the web mapping application and data within the map; Easily FIND metadata/information about the data in the web mapping application; Easily USE the web mapping application without training (Training to use, and/or build)
Comments: EASILY is a very arbitrary description. I wonder if a description of controls actually would be better. Also, revised questions actually make more sense here.

Question:: Is map easy to navigate? (controls, search)
